entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as moaning and putting his face in his hands, indicating he is upset. He is also talking but his words are barely distinguishable.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as explaining to Ron that Ginny is part Veela and was not at fault for her behavior.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as being part Veela and using the old charm on Diggory. She also told Harry she would go with him.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is mentioned as someone Ginny was using her charm on.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is mentioned as the person Diggory is going with.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as someone who has asked Hermione to go with him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being asked by Neville to go with him.

relationships.description: Ron was rejected by Ginny when he asked her to go with him.
Harry asked Ginny out, but she told him no.
Neville asked Hermione to go with him.
